name: Ashley Drake
bio: I enjoy writing Python at work and for personal projects; I love it's expressiveness and adaptability.

name: Andrea Grandi
bio: I work as software developer at UK Government Digital Service. I like Python, Django, Machine Learning and security.

name: Ajo John
bio: I love Javascript. Great fan of Vuejs. Loves Open Source.

name: Avremel Kaminetzky
bio: I enjoy hacking with Python, it is my language of choice for prototyping and side projects.

name: David Carroll
bio: My primary professional language is Python, which I like for its flexibility and expressiveness, but I also enjoy using Rust because of its power and high-quality tooling.  I'm a former CS professor.

name: Anukul Sangwan
bio: I'm an undergraduate software engineering research student, and I love to hack on interesting stuff, no matter what the language!

name: Alex Bender
bio: Sharing is what really matters. So I'd like to share my Python knowledge to augment (help develop) present capabilities of anyone who desires to know Python.

name: Alex Halford
bio: I use python a lot at work, and I really enjoy helping people to learn new skills!

name: Alex Guglielmone Nemi (Alex Hans)
link_text: The Living Deadline - Alex Hans Blog
bio: With 10+ years in software/product development, I love to be in a constant learning state and to help others in their journeys.  Mentoring on a site that focuses on encouraging critical skills and idiomatic code is an extremely enriching experience.

name: Adrian de Sanjose
bio: I am a young but experienced python programmer and my goal is to help people learn the art of programming.
